tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE public_health_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  disease_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  date_reported DATE NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Disease_Report (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    disease_name VARCHAR,
    patient_id UUID,
    location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Patient_Information (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender VARCHAR,
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE disease_cases (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_date DATE NOT NULL,
    disease_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    facility_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES public_health_facilities(facility_id)
);

CREATE TABLE surveillance_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT,
    surveillance_date DATE,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES disease_cases(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patient (
    patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    dob DATE,
    gender CHAR(1),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  age INT NOT NULL,
  gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE cases (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  disease_id INT NOT NULL,
  diagnosis_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (disease_id) REFERENCES diseases(disease_id)
);
